meanings.definition: Causing feelings of embarrassment or awkwardness
meanings.sent1: The cringeworthier situation made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her cringeworthier jokes always made people blush.
meanings.sent3: The cringeworthier dance moves were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: His cringeworthier attempts at flirting were painful to watch.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthier speech left the audience squirming in their seats.

meanings.definition: More likely to make someone feel embarrassed or awkward than something else
meanings.sent1: Out of all the outfits, hers was the cringeworthier choice.
meanings.sent2: The cringeworthier moments in the movie were hard to watch.
meanings.sent3: His cringeworthier comments always made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The cringeworthier situation was like a trainwreck you couldn't look away from.
meanings.sent5: The cringeworthier photoshoot captured all the awkwardness perfectly.
